____DESCRIPTION____: Here we define any custom weathers from the 'name' property in it's file
____DESCRIPTION2____: All seasons must be defined to work. if they arent used, leave the object blank
____DESCRIPTION3____: Don't add default weathers into this file unless they are copy pasted into the 'custom' folder

AUTUMN_LATE.___INFO___: Define the weight for the custom weather
AUTUMN_LATE.___INFO2___: Custom weather weights are added to the default weather weights
